dt: {bc}a grayish-white hard brittle metalloid element that resembles silicon and is used especially in optical and semiconductor materials and as a catalyst {dx}see {dxt|Chemical Elements Table|element|table}{/dx}

et: New Latin, from Medieval Latin {it}Germania{/it} Germany
shortdef: a grayish-white hard brittle metalloid element that resembles silicon and is used especially in optical and semiconductor materials and as a catalyst
